awd_titl_txt: United States-South Africa Study Group in Engineering       Research and Education for the Manufacturing Industry
awd_abstract_narration: This award establishes a USA Study Group formulated to                     investigate engineering research and education issues related to                manufacturing industries.  In conjunction with a similar group                  funded by the Foundation for Research Development in South Africa,              the interaction of the two groups will allow for a sharing of past              experiences and visions for the future.  The exchange focuses on                human resources development issues, including programs designed to              increase the number of educated engineers from population segments              that traditionally do not select technologically oriented careers.              Two-week visits in each other's country includes stops at                       representative educational institutions and the holding of focused              workshops to develop reports identifying areas of possible further              interactions.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
